name: FastMarching
public_declarations: typedef  enum { Nothing, NoHandles, Strict } TopologyCheckType;

members.name: NormalizationFactor
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get the Normalization Factor for the Speed Image. The values in the Speed Imageis divided by this factor. This allows the use of images with integer pixel types to represent the speed.

members.name: StoppingValue
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the Fast Marching algorithm Stopping Value. The Fast Marching algorithm is terminated when the value of the smallest trial point is greater than the stopping value.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the Fast Marching algorithm Stopping Value.
